job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of AI into the full stack of web applications, which falls under traditional software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions working with LLMs and creating AI features, which is a core aspect of model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the development and coding of web applications with AI integration, covering both front-end and back-end aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need for integrated development rather than siloed AI features, aligning with a full-stack development approach.

job_tasks.phrase: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the requirement for full-stack development and integration of different components.

job_tasks.phrase: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the end-to-end product development lifecycle, which is a software development responsibility, particularly in a full-stack context.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, taking ownership of the product implies responsibility for its lifecycle, which can include operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: Creating autonomous tools and interactive features points to the application and refinement of AI models.
Launching and iterating implies the operational aspects of deploying and refining software, including AI components.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on understanding the impact on users (students) and aligning technical solutions with business goals (educational technology standards).

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the business outcome (accelerate learning outcomes) and the target audience (students), requiring business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key

classification.rationale: The job description strongly emphasizes working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude to create AI-powered applications, aligning with the core definition of a GenAI Engineer. The role requires full-stack development to integrate these AI features into user-facing systems, with responsibilities including RAG-like capabilities (implied by 'autonomous tools and interactive features') and the development of applications around generative models.
